title: The Living Oracles
verses:
The living oracles of God,
How precious are thy words;
More to be prized than finest gold,
Than honey from the Lord.

Thy word is a lamp unto my feet,
And a light unto my path;
It guides me in the way of peace,
And saves from coming wrath.

Forever settled in the heavens,
Thy word shall never fail;
Thy testimonies, O my God,
Forever shall prevail.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Reverence for Scripture as the source of prophetic understanding and divine guidance
